Package swinghelper.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonManager
    Processes the annotations for the JButtons.
    SwingUtils
    A utility class to make constructing containers to add to the processing window easier.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WrongTypeException
    This exception isn't used jet but will be in the next version.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ColorScheme
    Allow formatting buttons.
    MethodButton
    Allows adding methods to be executed when a button is pressed.
